import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router" import React from "react" function UpdateForm({commentID}) { //const history = useNavigate() const { commentId } = useParams() console.log(commentId) const [comment, setComment] = useState({ song_name: '', rating: '', name: '', comment: '', date: '' }) useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { const response = await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/comments/${commentId}`) const resData = await response.json() setComment(resData) } fetchData() }, [ commentId ]) async function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/comments/${comment.commentId}`, { method: 'PUT', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(comment) }) window.location="/comments" } return (

Edit Place

setComment({ ...comment, song_name: e.target.value })} className="form-control" id="song_name" name="song_name" />
setComment({ ...comment, rating: e.target.value })} className="form-control" id="rating" name="rating" type= "number" min="1" max="10" />
setComment({ ...comment, name: e.target.value })} className="form-control" id="name" name="name" />
setComment({ ...comment, comment: e.target.value })} className="form-control" id="comment" name="comment" />
setComment({ ...comment, date: e.target.value })} className="form-control" id="date" name="date" type="date" min="2022-07-01" max="2030-12-30" />
) } export default UpdateForm
